attributes.action: put before parliament a bill to reduce MP's pay to the level of nursing staff in the NHS, so as to get MPs with a greater interest in the welfare of the British people and country than in the money they get paid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nurses in the NHS do not get paid very much for the work they do, yet carry out essential work caring for patients. If MPs were paid at a similar level, more of them would be in their posts out of a sense of service rather than for the money.
